DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial conduct study whether eat certain meal reduce desire eat long period time compare others determine post-meal glucose response associate breakfast food .
DOC.detailed_description: The study divide 3 phase . Each phase involve eat one 3 different breakfast every day 1 month . The order breakfast product random . During phase participant come research clinic 4 visit ( 1 per week ) assessment appetite-related sensation . Gastric empty assess 1 visit per phase post prandial glucose response measure 1 visit per phase ( Asper site ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy Males female ( pregnant lactating ) age 19 60 year . 2 . Body mass index : 18.530 kg/m2 . 1 . A change medication ( dose type ) medical event require hospitalization within past month . 2 . Daily tobacco use . 3 . Physical Activity Level > 1.8 . 4 . Eat meal irregular unusual time . 5 . Food allergy , aversion unwillingness eat study food . 6 . Use prescription nonprescription drug , herbal nutritional supplement know affect appetite blood sugar . 7 . Presence gastrointestinal disorder . 8 . Taking drug affect gastric emptying . 9 . Score > 65 % 1 3 category Three Factor Eating QuestionnaireR18 .
